answers.answer: Hello,I do think you should have your glucose retested very soon, and with a 2 hour gluose tolerance test instead of only the fasting glucose.  In addition there may be some other tests needed because autoimmune diseases can come in groups instead of just one and include others like Type 1 diabetes, liver disease, malabsorption syndromes, rheumatologic syndromes etc.Having some relatively low blood sugrs can be quite normal in young slender women, especially those who are very active, and all you may need is a change in your diet(spacing out several small meals instead of big ones, and avoiding carb-heavy snacks). But weight loss with any group of complaints should be evaluated fully so it is best that you speak with and see your doctor s soon as possible.Take care.
